document_data.name: Medrash
document_data.mainbody:
'''Medrash''' was a musician and entertainer, part of the [[Circus of the Last Days]] troupe in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You know what you need? A ripper of a ballad! Prepare your heart, nay - your very soul!''|Medrash}}
document_data.Description: Medrash was a [[dragonborn]] with a [[red dragon]] ancestry. He had flaming red eyes and wore a fanciful [[bard]]'s garb. He was a proficient [[lyre]] player.
document_data.Abilities: As a red dragonborn, Medrash could breathe out a burst of flames. He also could cast the ''[[faerie fire]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Circus of the Last Days returned from the [[Feywild]] and opened its gates to the inhabitants of the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] district in [[Baldur's Gate]]. Medrash entertained guests at the circus when it was revealed that the [[Cult of the Absolute]] murdered one of the troupe â€“ the clown called [[Dribbles]], and replaced him with a murderous [[doppelganger]].
